vclaim: After only nine months in office, President Trump and family had already spent $147 million on personal travel, amounting to one-and-a-half times as much as President Obama and family spent in the eight years of the latter's presidency.
title: Is Trump Spending More Taxpayer Dollars on Personal Travel than Obama Did?
subtitle: Despite preliminary indications that the Trump family's government-paid travel expenses are higher than the Obamas', Internet rumors exaggerate the disparity.
author: David Emery
